name: student-welfare-platform
description: Student Welfare & Campus Life Platform is a backend-driven system built to manage and secure key aspects of campus life such as hostel accommodation, student onboarding, and identity verification. It uses a role-based architecture for students and hostel owners, enforcing strong data integrity and access control. The platform implements secure authentication, email-based OTP verification, and PostgreSQL persistence to ensure every user action is validated and traceable. It is designed with a server-first trust model where all sensitive operations are controlled and verified at the backend.
